cab.content: From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,2nd August 1919.10478. 2nd August. No." 83. ^Part 1. There is no important change in the situation.2. Further reports from Kuram state that tribal gathering in Khurmana Valley (vide our telegram of the 1st instant, No. 82), composed of Masonzai, Orakzai and. Para Chankannis, mainly bad characters who collected on hearing of Mahmus Akhundzada's arrival. Latter is now reported to have returned to Khanki Valley.-Part 2. Fort Sandeman reports 11 tribesmen killed and 5 wounded in minor enterprises. Zhob Mobile Column will be ready to move from Murgha on 8th August.Communicated to Press.
